name: Greta Thunberg
description: Climate- and environmental activist with Asperger‚Äôs Born at 375 ppm
tweet: Sadly, today the level of awareness is so low. So many go undiagnosed and will therefore not receive the help they need and may go their whole life believing something is wrong with them. 5/7

name: Greta Thunberg
description: Climate- and environmental activist with Asperger‚Äôs Born at 375 ppm
tweet: Almost everywhere there are very limited resources to give autistic people the necessary support. Without these adjustments autism can turn into a disability. But under the right circumstances it can truly be a gift and turn into something you - and society - can benefit from.4/7

name: Greta Thunberg
description: Climate- and environmental activist with Asperger‚Äôs Born at 375 ppm
tweet: That more people are diagnosed with autism etc isn‚Äôt because there is an ‚Äúinflation‚Äù in diagnoses but since awareness is increasing and many highly sensitive people experience stress related problems in modern society which gives them reason to suspect they‚Äôre on the spectrum.3/7

name: Greta Thunberg
description: Climate- and environmental activist with Asperger‚Äôs Born at 375 ppm
tweet: Today, so many (especially girls) remain undiagnosed. The reasons for that are often lack of awareness, prejudices and the fact that many still see autism as a ‚Äúdisease‚Äù or something that has to hold you back. 2/7

name: Greta Thunberg

Before I started school striking I had no energy, no friends and I didn‚Äôt speak to anyone. I just sat alone at home, with an eating disorder.
All of that is gone now, since I have found a meaning, in a world that sometimes seems shallow and meaningless to so many people.

name: Greta Thunberg
description: Climate- and environmental activist with Asperger‚Äôs Born at 375 ppm

tweet:
And then we need to get the emissions to minus by inventing new technologies, if we are to stay below 1,5 or 2¬∞C of warming. Which we must...
The fact that we are speaking of ‚Äúlowering‚Äù instead of stopping emissions is perhaps the greatest force behind business as usual.

name: Greta Thunberg
description: Climate- and environmental activist with Asperger‚Äôs Born at 375 ppm
tweet: The ‚Äúlowering of emissions‚Äù is of course necessary but it is only the beginning of a fast process that must lead to a stop within a couple of decades. (Note that rich countries need to get down to zero emissions sooner than that according to the Paris Agreement.)‚Äî>

name: Greta Thunberg
description: Climate- and environmental activist with Asperger‚Äôs Born at 375 ppm
tweet:
Perhaps the most dangerous misconception about the climate crisis is that we have to ‚Äúlower‚Äù our emissions. Because that is far from enough. Our emissions have to stop if we are to stay below 1,5/2¬∞C warming.
That rules out most of today‚Äôs politics. Including airport expansions..
